statements: SELECT * FROM GamificationNotifications;
SELECT notification_id, event_name FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT message, event_time FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE event_name = 'Level Up' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE player_id = 200 ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, player_id FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE event_time >= '2022-01-01' AND event_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE player_id = 10 ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT notification_id, event_name, message FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE event_name LIKE '%level up%' AND player_id IN (2, 5, 8);
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE player_id = 7 AND event_time > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM GamificationNotifications GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT notification_id, event_name, message FROM GamificationNotifications WHERE player_id = 3 AND message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, notification_title FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 1;
SELECT notification_title, notification_message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_title, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT notification_title, notification_message, event_id FROM notifications WHERE notification_id > 5 ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT notification_title, event_name FROM notifications INNER JOIN events ON notifications.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT notification_title, event_name FROM notifications LEFT JOIN events ON notifications.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert';
SELECT challenge_name, start_date, end_date FROM challenges ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'reminder' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Alert';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, timestamp FROM notifications JOIN events ON notifications.notification_id = events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Notifications;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM Notifications;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM Notifications ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Notifications;
SELECT * FROM Notifications WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM Notifications WHERE receiver_id = '987e6543-12ab-45cd-6789-098765432100' AND send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT notification_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM Notifications WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY sender_id ASC, receiver_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM Notifications WHERE send_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM Notifications GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM events WHERE start_time < '2022-10-01';
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, is_read, read_at FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = false ORDER BY read_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM events WHERE start_time < NOW();
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, start_date, end_date FROM challenges WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
